input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Authentic Brand NEW PNC VF-4 Universal LCD View Finder Extend Bracket ONLY

Item specifications:
The Extension Bracket is to extend the range of the PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder to fit taller cameras or DSLR camera bodies with an added battery grip. The bracket adds an additional 1.3" (33mm) of height adjustment.
The Extension Bracket is to be used with PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder.
Package Included: Extension Bracket Only ( VF-4 Viewfinder is NOT included)
7-Day Money Back Guarantee, 1 Year USA Limited Warranty.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is a brand new, original PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder Extension Bracket.  It is an optional accessory that enables the VF-4 to be used on taller cameras or DSLR camera bodies with an added battery grip.  The bracket adds an additional 1.3" (33mm) of height adjustment.  This item is in brand new, perfect condition and comes with a full USA warranty.
input_text.Response B: The authentic brand new PNC VF-4 Universal LCD View Finder Extend Bracket only, as picture shown, it extends the range of the PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder to fit taller cameras or DSLR camera bodies with an added battery grip, it adds an additional 1.3" (33mm) of height adjustment, the bracket is to be used with PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder, not included. We also provide 7-day money back guarantee and 1 year USA limited warranty.

label_annotations.feedback: They should say "an extension bracket - to fit the range of" PNC etc
